name: Light Bulb 3
description:
Epilepsy Warning!!!!

This game is a black and white game and is not sutible for those who can not stare bright lighting for too long.If you are one of those people i recommend you take a break sometimes.

Inspired off of the game on roblox Light Bulb by Zeekers a awsome game dev who made alot of games on gamejolt buuuuuuut, the games no longer work because over the years roblox has changed the way lua scripting works.After seeing the game now that you cant complete it i felt that i had to making a comic out of this at school and so i did Light Bulb 2 but that comic is LONG gone now so i cant make it.So i decided to make Before Light Bulb 2.I will make its here.But here is Light Bulb 3.Auto saving is in this game

There is also a gamejolt page!
